GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: sdata can be NULL during AMPDU start

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.165 by commit 187523fa7c2d4c780f775cb869216865c4a909ef. For more details please see the references link.
